name: Shortbow
description: Compact and lightweight, favored by scouts, bandits, and nimble archers. Effective for quick shots in tight spaces.

name: Longbow
description: Tall, finely crafted bow that delivers powerful shots over great distances. Preferred by elite archers and rangers.

name: Light Crossbow
description: A simple mechanical bow that fires bolts with deadly accuracy. Easy to use but slower to reload than bows.

name: Heavy Crossbow
description: A powerful crossbow that can pierce armor, favored by well-trained mercenaries. Requires both strength and time to reload.

name: Throwing Knife
description: Balanced for tossing with precision. Effective for rogues and sneaky attackers at short distances.
